description: This table is used for dental related transaction information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: ARCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Displays the dental arch used for the procedure.  The value displayed will be either Upper or Lower.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lower


Upper

columns.name: QUADRANT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Displays the dental quadrant used for the procedure. The value displayed could be one of several options, such as Lower Left or Maxillary Area.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lower Left


Lower Right


Upper Left


Upper Right


Whole Oral Cavity


Maxillary Area


Mandibular Area


Upper Right Sextant


Upper Anterior Sextant


Upper Left Sextant


Lower Left Sextant


Lower Anterior Sextant


Lower Right Sextant

columns.name: AREA
columns.description: Displays the dental area used for the procedure. The displayed value will be a range of teeth. For example 1-2,10-B, or A-B.

columns.name: SUPERNUMERARY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether multiple teeth are present in the socket.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_MONTHS
columns.description: The number of months after which this procedure requires follow-up.

columns.name: HYGIENIST_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider acting as a hygienist who is responsible for each procedure

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment plan used in this procedure.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_DATE
columns.description: Displays the date the recall must be made by.

columns.name: DENTAL_CHG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates what type of orthodontic or predetermination charge it is.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Visit Charge


Periodic Charge


Initial Charge


Predetermination Charge


Banding Charge

columns.name: DENTAL_PREAUTH_AMT
columns.description: The amount that gets set on predetermination claims for the predetermination dental charge.

columns.name: DENTAL_PREAUTH_QTY
columns.description: The quantity that gets set on predetermination claims for the predetermination dental charge.
